channel.title: Comments for page "Dark Hour Attunement"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dark Hour Attunement"

item.title: well.this really sucks..
item.content:encoded:
Started with Half Moon from yesterday,

- 38 battles
- +17 range and levels
- lvl 100
- Season 6

And somehow it seems like it was a shitload harder than yesterday!! This is like impossible! I'm too weak to fight anyone in the arena and win but the stronger i get THE HARDER THE PEOPLE in the arena! Almost everytime, i go up against either lvl 225 Protagonists or against a season 5 with 35(+48) lvls..am i the only one experiencing this or is this just a general thing because i'm really starting to think the RNG just hates me..

item.title: moon waning
item.content:encoded: the moon will wane 1 level, just like if you lost 1 Dark Hour fight.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: How many levels will it wane at Dayroll?
